sentences.english: Jarvis on behalf of the senior members of the People's Party, accused Carl Singh, "regardless of public opinion."
sentences.chinese: 人民黨高級成員賈維代卡爾指責辛格“不顧民意”。

sentences.english: The Pakistan Peoples Party and our family have had a three-generation relationship with China.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦人民黨和我們家族與中國有三代的友誼。

sentences.english: The Populist platform demanded easier credit and currency policies to help farmers.
sentences.chinese: 人民黨的政綱要求放鬆信貸和貨幣政策以幫助農民。

sentences.english: At this election, the Congress was wiped out and the Janata government came to power.
sentences.chinese: 在這次選舉中，國會被淘汰，人民黨政府上臺執政。

sentences.english: Mukhtar Abbas Naqvi is a Muslim and vice president of the BJP.
sentences.chinese: 納克維是一名穆斯林，也是印度人民黨的副主席。

sentences.english: The People's Party group, as the largest political group in the European Parliament, is duty-bound in every means.
sentences.chinese: 人民黨黨團作爲歐洲議會第一大黨團更是責無旁貸。

sentences.english: In the 1894 congressional elections, Populists took 11 percent of all votes cast.
sentences.chinese: 1894年國會選舉中，人民黨贏得總票數的11%。

sentences.english: The main opposition Bharatiya Janata Party is also discussing the reasons which led to its poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 主要反對黨印度人民黨也在討論其表現不佳的原因。

sentences.english: He has already lost two general elections and his party, unsurprisingly, seethes with barely contained rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 他已經兩度落選，人民黨也無疑叛念中燒。

definition: François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017
